verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Hosanna, hosanna, newline Hosanna in the highest! newline Hosanna, hosanna, newline Hosanna in the highest! newline Lord we lift up Your name newline With hearts full of praise! newline Be exalted oh Lord my God, newline Hosanna in the highest!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Glory, glory, newline Glory to the King of Kings! newline Glory, glory, newline Glory to the King of Kings! newline Lord we lift up your name With hearts full of praise! newline Be exalted oh Lord my God, newline Glory to the King of Kings!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus, jesus, newline Jesus is the prince of peace! newline Jesus, jesus, newline Jesus is the prince of peace! newline Lord we lift up your name With hearts full of praise! newline Be exalted oh Lord my God, newline Jesus is the prince of peace!
